com.toolrental.data

Class ToolCharge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.toolrental.data.ToolCharge

  • public class ToolCharge
extends java.lang.Object
    ToolCharge is a bean class mainly with properties, setters and getters which contains definitions for tool rental pricing.

    The main repository of tool charge definitions is accessible from ToolChargeDAO.getToolCharge(toolType).

    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $Date: 2024/12/03 12:00:00
    Author:
    Michael Escott
